  • Uses of ViewCard in card_model

    Subclasses of ViewCard in card_model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ActionCard
    The ActionCard class represents a special card in the game that has an action associated with it, such as Skip or Reverse.
    class 
    Card
    The abstract class Card represents a generic card in the game.
    class 
    NumberCard
    The NumberCard class represents a numbered card in the UNO game.
    class 
    WildCard
    The WildCard class represents a wild card in the UNO game.
